verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Eo an-tsandrinao, ry Ray,
Miantoraka izahay
Avy tsy misalasala
Na dia lavitra ny vala
Ny nitoeranay hatrizay.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Na tsy mendrika aza re,
Hodiovinao anio
Ka hamirapiratra
Toa masoandro mirana.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Izy mantsy re no loha
Tokana ahitana soa
Ka ireo tsela-mahajambena
Manodidina ny tena
Samy rava hatrizao.
Na tsy mendrika, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Eny, anio ho mandrakizay
Ny fiainako ry Ray
Eo am-pelatananao
No apetrako izao
Raiso Tompo, anjakao.
Na tsy mendrika, sns.
